data.author: Richard Simpson

changelog.release_notes: V1.3 - Layout change, duplicate Pokemon nearby bug fixed, Pokedex languages added (next release to include full language support), options enhanced to allow selection of scan and notification distance, option added to "hunt" particular Pokemon, Pokemon images added, Backlight bug fixed.
V1.2 = Various code fixes, settings re-added with new options, error reporting code added, ability to show names and distances of pokemon nearby, ability to turn 35m notification limit off.
v1.2 - Removed settings option, changed notification distance from 50m to 35m, minor bug fixes.

data.description:
Pokemon Go, Pokemon finder, locate Pokemon close to you without the Pokemon Go app.

31/7/16 - Servers Down, Working on Fix!

Have a feature request, please contact me!

Love my app? Please donate: http://bit.ly/2awtWST

How does it work?
Simply leave the Pebble application running and when you are within 35 meters (or notification distance set in settings) of a Pokemon your Pebble will vibrate and display the nearby Pokemon information. If no Pokemon are within the notification distance a list of Pokemon nearby will be displayed.

Q. Searching... is displayed with no nearby Pokemon?
A. Servers could be overloaded, or you are in an area with no nearby Pokemon.

Q. Do I need to run the Pokemon Go application on my phone at the same time?
A. No, the Pebble application works independently of the Pokemon Go application on your phone.

== TODO/IMPROVEMENTS ==
1. Additional language programming for full multi language capability.

Not affiliated with Niantic or Nintendo. All trademarks property of their respective owners.
